__e: That's really sad, because you're a writer and that's the best excuse you can come up with.
But I am a writer, and as such, I think I'm obligated to use my voice to talk about things that are meaningful to me. And...
Well, look, you know, you're a good writer and anything's possible so why don't you call me after the new year, okay?
It's like a real writer thinks I'm a real writer.
And like she's like, "I think you're like the greatest writer ever, and, like I wanna be just like you"...
